title: "go run" outside of GOPATH does not use latest version of installed dependencies
body:
by **edmccard@hotmail.com**: 
When executing "go run foo.go"

- from a directory outside GOPATH, where
- "foo.go" imports a package "bar" that is inside GOPATH, and
- "bar" has been installed with "go install",

then "go run" always uses the installed "bar.a" even if the pacakge
.go files are updated.

I am using Go 1.1.2, 64-bit Linux.
